messages.text: Hi, I'm looking for a 2BHK in Dubai
Great! Any specific area in mind?
Preferably Marina or JVC
What's your budget?
Max 120k. Can we do a site visit this week?
What properties do you have available?
We have apartments, villas, and penthouses. What are you interested in?
Tell me more about the 3BHK apartments
They range from 1500-2000 sqft with modern amenities
What amenities are included?
Hi, I saw a property listed for 150k
Yes, that's a beautiful 3BHK in Downtown
That's a bit over my budget. Any room for negotiation?
Let me check with the owner. What's your budget?
I can go up to 135k maximum. Can you offer a discount?
Hello, I booked a property last week but haven't received confirmation
I apologize for the delay. Can you share your booking ID?
It's BK12345
Let me look that up for you
Also, the payment gateway showed an error. Can you help?
Hi, I contacted you last month about a villa in Palm Jumeirah
Yes, I remember. How can I help you today?
Just following up - any updates on availability?
Let me check the current status
I'm still interested if it's available
Do you have any studios available?
Yes, we have several. What's your preferred location?
Near metro stations, furnished preferably
We have options in Business Bay and JLT
Great! When can I view them? I'm free tomorrow
I need help with my lease agreement
What seems to be the issue?
There's an error in the tenant name
I can help you correct that. Can you send the document?
Yes, sending now. How long will the correction take?
What's the price range for 1BHK in Marina?
Typically between 75k to 95k annually
That's quite high. Any cheaper options?
We have some in JVC starting at 65k
65k is still stretching it. Can you do 60k?
Hi, I'm relocating to Dubai for work
Welcome! When are you planning to move?
Next month. Looking for family-friendly areas
Arabian Ranches and Jumeirah Village are great options
What kind of properties are available there?
I scheduled a viewing for today but can't make it
No problem. Would you like to reschedule?
Yes please. Can we do it this Saturday?
Let me check availability
10 AM works best for me if possible
